amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. ___. None of the funds made available in this Act to the Department of Justice may be used, with respect to the States of Alaska, Arizona, California, Colorado, Delaware, District of Columbia, Hawaii, Maine, Maryland, Michigan, Montana, Nevada, New Jersey, New Mexico, Oregon, Rhode Island, Vermont, and Washington, to prevent such States from implementing their own State laws that authorize the use, distribution, possession, or cultivation of medical marijuana.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used with respect to preventing the States of Alaska, Arizona, California, Colorado, Delaware, District of Columbia, Hawaii, Maine, Maryland, Michigan, Montana, Nevada, New Jersey, New Mexico, Oregon, Rhode Island, Vermont, and Washington from implementing their own State laws that authorize the use, distribution, possession, or cultivation of medical marijuana.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 262 (Roll no. 238).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 262 (Roll no. 238).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. Rohrabacher.
